      • moveToHue

        Response moveToHue(int hue,
                 int direction,
                 int transitionTime)
                   throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Sets hue according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Parameters:
        hue - hue (degrees) / 360 * 254 in the range 0 - 254.
        direction - 0 = shortest, 1 = longest, 2 = up, 3 = down
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveHue

        Response moveHue(int moveMode,
               int rate)
                 throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Moves hue according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Parameters:
        moveMode - 0 = stop, 1 = up, 2 = reserved, 3 = down
        rate - steps per second
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • stepHue

        Response stepHue(int stepMode,
               int stepSize,
               int transtionTime)
                 throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Steps hue according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Parameters:
        stepMode - 0 = reserved, 1 = up, 2 = reserved, 3 = down
        stepSize - step to be added or subtracted from current hue
        transtionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • movetoSaturation

        Response movetoSaturation(int saturation,
                        int transitionTime)
                          throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Moves to saturation according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Parameters:
        saturation - saturation * 254 in the range 0 - 254.
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveSaturation

        Response moveSaturation(int moveMode,
                      int rate)
                        throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Moves saturation according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Parameters:
        moveMode - 0 = stop, 1 = up, 2 = reserved, 3 = down
        rate - steps per second
        Returns:
        the result
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • stepSaturation

        Response stepSaturation(int stepMode,
                      int stepSize,
                      int transitionTime)
                        throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Steps saturation according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Parameters:
        stepMode - 0 = reserved, 1 = up, 2 = reserved, 3 = down
        stepSize - step to be added or subtracted from current saturation
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the result
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveToHueAndSaturation

        Response moveToHueAndSaturation(int hue,
                              int saturation,
                              int transitionTime)
                                throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Moves to hue and saturation according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Parameters:
        hue - hue (degrees) / 360 * 254 in the range 0 - 254.
        saturation - saturation * 254 in the range 0 - 254.
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the result
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveToColor

        Response moveToColor(int colorX,
                   int colorY,
                   int transitionTime)
                     throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Moves to color according to CIE 1931 Color Space.
        Parameters:
        colorX - x * 65536 where colorX can be in rance 0 to 65279
        colorY - y * 65536 where colorY can be in rance 0 to 65279
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveColor

        Response moveColor(int rateX,
                 int rateY)
                   throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Moves color according to CIE 1931 Color Space.
        Parameters:
        rateX - steps per second in X value
        rateY - steps per second in X value
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • stepColor

        Response stepColor(int stepX,
                 int stepY,
                 int transitionTime)
                   throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Steps color according to CIE 1931 Color Space.
        Parameters:
        stepX - step to be added or subtracted from current X value
        stepY - step to be added or subtracted from current Y value
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveToColorTemperature

        Response moveToColorTemperature(int colorTemperature,
                              int transitionTime)
                                throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Moves to color temperature.
        Parameters:
        colorTemperature - 1 000 000 / color temperature (Kelvins) in the range 1 to 65279
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.
